title: Daisy
subject: Taylor Swift
description: "I once was poison ivy but now I am your daisy", inspired by her own words and the triumph and beauty she represents to her fans all over the world, a flower, a light and a queen

title: Angel
subject: Lady Fit
description: Of deep personal significance to me, it represents a real turning point in my life, a moment that can only be descibed as light rushing into a dark cave and the wings of an angel, love, light and an ocean. What more does a guy need.

title: Flower
subject: Kendall Jenner
description: "Natures first green is gold, her hardest hue to hold, her early leaf's a flower but only so an hour", from Robert Frost's poem, Nothing Gold Can Stay a tribute to the fragility of beauty, innocence and youth, a celebration of its secrets and a woman who encapsulates them all.

title: Tulip
subject: Dua Lipa
description: Stiill in transit through time and space, my mind and its future place.

title: Kids
subject: Berlin Wall Kids
description: Barriers to love, to peace, to freedom, to prosperity and far too often to the truth, obdurate fences around haunting romances and the view from above it all, in defiance
